remarks: A 1-dim subspace (atom) (of a left module or left vector space) contains a nonzero vector.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lsateln0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsateln0.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsateln0.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lsateln0.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. A ) $.
lsateln0 $p |- ( ph -> E. v e. U v =/= .0. ) $.
$d .0. v $.
$d U v $.
$d W v $.
$d ph v $.
